member.name: RoErrorReportingFlags
member.summary: Specifies the behavior of the and functions.

member.name: RoErrorReportingFlags.SuppressExceptions
member.summary: Error functions do not raise structured exceptions, even when a debugger is present. Override the behavior of this flag by setting the ForceExceptions flag.

member.name: RoErrorReportingFlags.ForceExceptions
member.summary: Error functions raise structured exceptions, even if no debugger is present. This flag supercedes the SuppressExceptions flag. If this flag is set, structured exceptions are raised even if the SuppressExceptions flag is set.

member.name: RoErrorReportingFlags.UseSetErrorInfo
member.summary: Error functions report error strings through a COM object that is attached to the COM channel through the SetErrorInfo infrastructure. This flag requires that the calling thread be initialized into COM.

member.name: RoErrorReportingFlags.SuppressSetErrorInfo
member.summary: Error functions do not report error strings through a COM object that is attached to the COM channel through the SetErrorInfo infrastructure.
